query.statement: SELECT A.CNTRT_ID , SEQNO /* , TO_CHAR(MOD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MOD_DT */ , CONVERT(VARCHAR,MOD_DT, 23) AS MOD_DT , ORG_MNG_TYPE /* , (SELECT CD_NM FROM TB_COM_CD WHERE GRP_CD='OM' AND CD = ORG_MNG_TYPE) AS ORG_MNG_TYPE_NM */ , DBO.LAS_CODE_NM('OM', ORG_MNG_TYPE, :vo.session_user_locale) AS ORG_MNG_TYPE_NM , MOD_NM , MOD_JIKGUP_NM , MOD_DEPT_NM , ORG_MNG_REQMAN_NM , ORG_MNG_REQ_DEPT_NM , ORG_MNG_REQ_JIKGUP_NM , B.MAX_SEQNO FROM TH_CLM_ORG_MNG A, (SELECT CNTRT_ID, MAX(SEQNO) MAX_SEQNO FROM TH_CLM_ORG_MNG WHERE CNTRT_ID = :vo.cntrt_id GROUP BY CNTRT_ID ) B WHERE A.CNTRT_ID = :vo.cntrt_id AND A.CNTRT_ID = B.CNTRT_ID ORDER BY SEQNO

SELECT CNTRT_ID , SEQNO /* ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CNTRTPERIOD_STARTDAY, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNTRTPERIOD_STARTDAY */ , CONVERT(DATE,CNTRTPERIOD_STARTDAY,120) AS CNTRTPERIOD_STARTDAY /* ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CNTRTPERIOD_ENDDAY, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNTRTPERIOD_ENDDAY */ , CONVERT(DATE,CNTRTPERIOD_ENDDAY,120) AS CNTRTPERIOD_ENDDAY , AUTO_RNEW_YN , CNTRT_AMT , CRRNCY_UNIT , SEAL_MTHD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM TB_COM_CD WHERE CD = SEAL_MTHD) SEAL_MTHD_NM /* , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(EXPRT_NOTIDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXPRT_NOTIDAY */ , CONVERT(DATE,EXPRT_NOTIDAY,120) AS EXPRT_NOTIDAY , SIGN_PLNDMAN_ID , SIGN_PLNDMAN_NM , SIGN_PLND_DEPT_NM , SIGN_PLNDMAN_JIKGUP_NM , SEAL_FFMTMAN_ID , SEAL_FFMTMAN_NM , SEAL_FFMT_DEPT_NM , SEAL_FFMTMAN_JIKGUP_NM , ORG_ACPT_DLAY_CAUSE /* , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ORG_ACPTDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORG_ACPTDAY */ , CONVERT(DATE,ORG_ACPTDAY,120) AS ORG_ACPTDAY , ORG_HDOVMAN_ID , ORG_HDOVMAN_NM , ORG_HDOV_DEPT_NM , ORG_HDOVMAN_JIKGUP_NM , ORG_STRG_POS /* , TO_CHAR(MOD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MOD_DT */ , CONVERT(VARCHAR,MOD_DT,23) AS MOD_ST , MOD_ID , MOD_NM , MOD_DEPT_NM , MOD_JIKGUP_NM , MOD_CAUSE /* , ORG_MNG_DT */ , CONVERT(DATE,ORG_MNG_DT,120) AS ORG_MNG_DT , ORG_MNG_TYPE /* , (SELECT CD_NM FROM TB_COM_CD WHERE GRP_CD='OM' AND CD = ORG_MNG_TYPE) AS ORG_MNG_TYPE_NM */ , DBO.LAS_CODE_NM('OM', ORG_MNG_TYPE, :vo.session_user_locale) AS ORG_MNG_TYPE_NM , ORG_MNG_REQMAN_ID , ORG_MNG_REQMAN_NM , ORG_MNG_REQ_DEPT_NM , ORG_MNG_REQ_JIKGUP_NM , CNTRT_RESPMAN_ID , CNTRT_RESPMAN_NM , CNTRT_RESPMAN_DEPT_NM , CNTRT_RESPMAN_JIKGUP_NM /* , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CNCLSN_PLNDDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNCLSN_PLNDDAY */ , CONVERT(DATE,CNCLSN_PLNDDAY,120) AS CNCLSN_PLNDDAY /* , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CNTRT_CNCLSNDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNTRT_CNCLSNDAY */ , CONVERT(DATE,CNTRT_CNCLSNDAY,120) AS CNTRT_CNCLSNDAY FROM TH_CLM_ORG_MNG WHERE CNTRT_ID = :vo.cntrt_id AND SEQNO = :vo.seqno
SELECT ISNULL(MAX(SEQNO),0) AS SEQNO FROM TH_CLM_ORG_MNG WHERE CNTRT_ID = :vo.cntrt_id

INSERT INTO TH_CLM_ORG_MNG ( CNTRT_ID,COMP_CD,SEQNO,GUBUN,CNTRTPERIOD_STARTDAY,CNTRTPERIOD_ENDDAY ,AUTO_RNEW_YN,CNTRT_AMT,CRRNCY_UNIT,SEAL_MTHD,EXPRT_NOTIDAY ,SIGN_PLNDMAN_ID,SIGN_PLNDMAN_NM,SIGN_PLND_DEPT_NM,SIGN_PLNDMAN_JIKGUP_NM,SEAL_FFMTMAN_ID ,SEAL_FFMTMAN_NM,SEAL_FFMT_DEPT_NM,SEAL_FFMTMAN_JIKGUP_NM,ORG_ACPT_DLAY_CAUSE,ORG_ACPTDAY ,ORG_HDOVMAN_ID,ORG_HDOVMAN_NM,ORG_HDOV_DEPT_NM,ORG_HDOVMAN_JIKGUP_NM,ORG_STRG_POS ,MOD_DT,MOD_ID,MOD_NM,MOD_DEPT_NM,MOD_JIKGUP_NM ,MOD_CAUSE,ORG_MNG_DT,ORG_MNG_TYPE,ORG_MNG_REQMAN_ID,ORG_MNG_REQMAN_NM ,ORG_MNG_REQ_DEPT_NM,ORG_MNG_REQ_JIKGUP_NM,CNTRT_RESPMAN_ID,CNTRT_RESPMAN_NM,CNTRT_RESPMAN_DEPT_NM ,CNTRT_RESPMAN_JIKGUP_NM,CNCLSN_PLNDDAY, CNTRT_CNCLSNDAY) SELECT CNTRT_ID,COMP_CD,1,'',CNTRTPERIOD_STARTDAY,CNTRTPERIOD_ENDDAY ,AUTO_RNEW_YN,CNTRT_AMT,CRRNCY_UNIT,SEAL_MTHD,EXPRT_NOTIDAY ,SIGN_PLNDMAN_ID,SIGN_PLNDMAN_NM,SIGN_PLND_DEPT_NM,SIGN_PLNDMAN_JIKGUP_NM,SEAL_FFMTMAN_ID ,SEAL_FFMTMAN_NM,SEAL_FFMT_DEPT_NM,SEAL_FFMTMAN_JIKGUP_NM,ORG_ACPT_DLAY_CAUSE,ORG_ACPTDAY ,ORG_HDOVMAN_ID,ORG_HDOVMAN_NM,ORG_HDOV_DEPT_NM,ORG_HDOVMAN_JIKGUP_NM,ORG_STRG_POS ,SYSDATETIME(),:vo.session_user_id,:vo.session_user_nm,:vo.session_dept_nm,:vo.session_jikgup_nm ,'','','','','' ,'','',CNTRT_RESPMAN_ID,CNTRT_RESPMAN_NM,CNTRT_RESP_DEPT_NM ,CNTRT_RESPMAN_JIKGUP_NM, CNCLSN_PLNDDAY, CNTRT_CNCLSNDAY FROM TN_CLM_CONTRACT_MASTER WHERE CNTRT_ID = :vo.cntrt_id AND DEL_YN = 'N'

INSERT INTO TH_CLM_ORG_MNG ( CNTRT_ID ,COMP_CD ,SEQNO ,CNTRTPERIOD_STARTDAY ,CNTRTPERIOD_ENDDAY ,AUTO_RNEW_YN ,CNTRT_AMT ,CRRNCY_UNIT ,SEAL_MTHD ,EXPRT_NOTIDAY ,SIGN_PLNDMAN_ID ,SIGN_PLNDMAN_NM ,SIGN_PLND_DEPT_NM ,SIGN_PLNDMAN_JIKGUP_NM ,SEAL_FFMTMAN_ID ,SEAL_FFMTMAN_NM ,SEAL_FFMT_DEPT_NM ,SEAL_FFMTMAN_JIKGUP_NM ,ORG_ACPT_DLAY_CAUSE ,ORG_ACPTDAY ,ORG_HDOVMAN_ID ,ORG_HDOVMAN_NM ,ORG_HDOV_DEPT_NM ,ORG_HDOVMAN_JIKGUP_NM ,ORG_STRG_POS ,MOD_DT ,MOD_ID ,MOD_NM ,MOD_DEPT_NM ,MOD_JIKGUP_NM ,MOD_CAUSE ,ORG_MNG_DT ,ORG_MNG_TYPE ,ORG_MNG_REQMAN_ID ,ORG_MNG_REQMAN_NM ,ORG_MNG_REQ_DEPT_NM ,ORG_MNG_REQ_JIKGUP_NM ,CNTRT_RESPMAN_ID ,CNTRT_RESPMAN_NM ,CNTRT_RESPMAN_DEPT_NM ,CNTRT_RESPMAN_JIKGUP_NM ,CNCLSN_PLNDDAY ,CNTRT_CNCLSNDAY ) VALUES ( :vo.cntrt_id ,:vo.session_auth_comp_cd ,(SELECT ISNULL(MAX(SEQNO),0)+1 FROM TH_CLM_ORG_MNG WHERE CNTRT_ID = :vo.cntrt_id) ,:vo.cntrtperiod_startday ,:vo.cntrtperiod_endday ,:vo.auto_rnew_yn ,ISNULL(:vo.cntrt_amt,0) ,:vo.crrncy_unit ,:vo.seal_mthd ,:vo.exprt_notiday ,:vo.sign_plndman_id ,:vo.sign_plndman_nm ,:vo.sign_plnd_dept_nm ,:vo.sign_plndman_jikgup_nm ,:vo.seal_ffmtman_id ,:vo.seal_ffmtman_nm ,:vo.seal_ffmt_dept_nm ,:vo.seal_ffmtman_jikgup_nm ,:vo.org_acpt_dlay_cause ,:vo.org_acptday ,:vo.org_hdovman_id ,:vo.org_hdovman_nm ,:vo.org_hdov_dept_nm ,:vo.org_hdovman_jikgup_nm ,:vo.org_strg_pos ,SYSDATETIME() ,:vo.session_user_id ,:vo.session_user_nm ,:vo.session_dept_nm ,:vo.session_jikgup_nm ,:vo.mod_cause ,:vo.org_mng_dt ,:vo.org_mng_type ,:vo.org_mng_reqman_id ,:vo.org_mng_reqman_nm ,:vo.org_mng_req_dept_nm ,:vo.org_mng_req_jikgup_nm ,:vo.cntrt_respman_id ,:vo.cntrt_respman_nm ,:vo.cntrt_resp_dept_nm ,:vo.cntrt_respman_jikgup_nm ,:vo.cnclsn_plndday ,:vo.cntrt_cnclsnday )

INSERT INTO TH_CLM_ORG_MNG ( CNTRT_ID ,SEQNO ,ORG_MNG_TYPE ,ORG_MNG_DT ,ORG_MNG_REQMAN_ID ,ORG_MNG_REQMAN_NM ,ORG_MNG_REQ_DEPT_NM ,ORG_MNG_REQ_JIKGUP_NM ,MOD_ID ,MOD_NM ,MOD_DEPT_NM ,MOD_JIKGUP_NM ,MOD_DT ) VALUES ( :vo.cntrt_id ,(SELECT ISNULL(MAX(SEQNO),0)+1 FROM TH_CLM_ORG_MNG WHERE CNTRT_ID = :vo.cntrt_id) ,:vo.org_mng_type ,REPLACE(:vo.org_mng_dt,'-','') ,:vo.org_mng_reqman_id ,:vo.org_mng_reqman_nm ,:vo.org_mng_req_dept_nm ,:vo.org_mng_req_jikgup_nm ,:vo.session_user_id ,:vo.session_user_nm ,:vo.session_dept_nm ,:vo.session_jikgup_nm ,SYSDATETIME() )

UPDATE TN_CLM_CONTRACT_MASTER SET CNTRTPERIOD_STARTDAY = :vo.cntrtperiod_startday ,CNTRTPERIOD_ENDDAY = :vo.cntrtperiod_endday ,AUTO_RNEW_YN = :vo.auto_rnew_yn ,CNTRT_AMT = CONVERT(FLOAT, ISNULL(:vo.cntrt_amt,0)) /*Sungwoo Replacement BIGINT to FLOAT 2014-06-23 */ ,CRRNCY_UNIT = :vo.crrncy_unit ,SEAL_MTHD = :vo.seal_mthd ,EXPRT_NOTIDAY = :vo.exprt_notiday ,SIGN_PLNDMAN_ID = :vo.sign_plndman_id ,SIGN_PLNDMAN_NM = :vo.sign_plndman_nm ,SIGN_PLND_DEPT_NM = :vo.sign_plnd_dept_nm ,SIGN_PLNDMAN_JIKGUP_NM = :vo.sign_plndman_jikgup_nm ,SEAL_FFMTMAN_ID = :vo.seal_ffmtman_id ,SEAL_FFMTMAN_NM = :vo.seal_ffmtman_nm ,SEAL_FFMT_DEPT_NM = :vo.seal_ffmt_dept_nm ,SEAL_FFMTMAN_JIKGUP_NM = :vo.seal_ffmtman_jikgup_nm ,ORG_ACPT_DLAY_CAUSE = :vo.org_acpt_dlay_cause ,ORG_ACPTDAY = :vo.org_acptday ,ORG_HDOVMAN_ID = :vo.org_hdovman_id ,ORG_HDOVMAN_NM = :vo.org_hdovman_nm ,ORG_HDOV_DEPT_NM = :vo.org_hdov_dept_nm ,ORG_HDOVMAN_JIKGUP_NM = :vo.org_hdovman_jikgup_nm ,ORG_STRG_POS = :vo.org_strg_pos ,CNTRT_RESPMAN_ID = :vo.cntrt_respman_id ,CNTRT_RESPMAN_NM = :vo.cntrt_respman_nm ,CNTRT_RESP_DEPT_NM = :vo.cntrt_resp_dept_nm ,CNTRT_RESPMAN_JIKGUP_NM = :vo.cntrt_respman_jikgup_nm ,CNCLSN_PLNDDAY = :vo.cnclsn_plndday ,CNTRT_CNCLSNDAY = :vo.cntrt_cnclsnday ,SIGNMAN_ID = :vo.signman_id ,SIGNMAN_JIKGUP_NM = :vo.signman_jikgup_nm ,SIGNMAN_NM = :vo.signman_nm ,SIGN_DEPT_NM = :vo.sign_dept_nm ,OPPNT_SIGNMAN_NM = :vo.oppnt_signman_nm ,OPPNT_SIGNMAN_JIKGUP = :vo.oppnt_signman_jikgup ,OPPNT_SIGNMAN_DEPT = :vo.oppnt_signman_dept ,OPPNT_SIGNDAY = :vo.oppnt_signday ,SIGNDAY = :vo.signday #if(!$vo.prcs_depth.equal("") && !$vo.depth_status.equal("")) /*2014-05-20 Kevin changed.*/ ,PRCS_DEPTH = :vo.Prcs_depth ,DEPTH_STATUS = :vo.Depth_status , MOD_DT = GETDATE() #end WHERE CNTRT_ID = :vo.cntrt_id

UPDATE TN_CLM_CONTRACT_MASTER SET CNTRTPERIOD_STARTDAY = :vo.cntrtperiod_startday ,CNTRTPERIOD_ENDDAY = :vo.cntrtperiod_endday ,AUTO_RNEW_YN = :vo.auto_rnew_yn ,CNTRT_AMT = CONVERT(FLOAT, ISNULL(:vo.cntrt_amt,0)) /*Sungwoo Replacement BIGINT to FLOAT 2014-06-23 */ ,CRRNCY_UNIT = :vo.crrncy_unit ,SEAL_MTHD = :vo.seal_mthd ,EXPRT_NOTIDAY = :vo.exprt_notiday ,SIGN_PLNDMAN_ID = :vo.sign_plndman_id ,SIGN_PLNDMAN_NM = :vo.sign_plndman_nm ,SIGN_PLND_DEPT_NM = :vo.sign_plnd_dept_nm ,SIGN_PLNDMAN_JIKGUP_NM = :vo.sign_plndman_jikgup_nm ,SEAL_FFMTMAN_ID = :vo.seal_ffmtman_id ,SEAL_FFMTMAN_NM = :vo.seal_ffmtman_nm ,SEAL_FFMT_DEPT_NM = :vo.seal_ffmt_dept_nm ,SEAL_FFMTMAN_JIKGUP_NM = :vo.seal_ffmtman_jikgup_nm ,ORG_ACPT_DLAY_CAUSE = :vo.org_acpt_dlay_cause ,ORG_ACPTDAY = :vo.org_acptday ,ORG_HDOVMAN_ID = :vo.org_hdovman_id ,ORG_HDOVMAN_NM = :vo.org_hdovman_nm ,ORG_HDOV_DEPT_NM = :vo.org_hdov_dept_nm ,ORG_HDOVMAN_JIKGUP_NM = :vo.org_hdovman_jikgup_nm ,ORG_STRG_POS = :vo.org_strg_pos ,CNTRT_RESPMAN_ID = :vo.cntrt_respman_id ,CNTRT_RESPMAN_NM = :vo.cntrt_respman_nm ,CNTRT_RESP_DEPT_NM = :vo.cntrt_resp_dept_nm ,CNTRT_RESPMAN_JIKGUP_NM = :vo.cntrt_respman_jikgup_nm ,CNCLSN_PLNDDAY = :vo.cnclsn_plndday ,CNTRT_CNCLSNDAY = :vo.cntrt_cnclsnday ,SIGNMAN_ID = :vo.signman_id ,SIGNMAN_JIKGUP_NM = :vo.signman_jikgup_nm ,SIGNMAN_NM = :vo.signman_nm ,SIGN_DEPT_NM = :vo.sign_dept_nm ,OPPNT_SIGNMAN_NM = :vo.oppnt_signman_nm ,OPPNT_SIGNMAN_JIKGUP = :vo.oppnt_signman_jikgup ,OPPNT_SIGNMAN_DEPT = :vo.oppnt_signman_dept ,OPPNT_SIGNDAY = :vo.oppnt_signday ,SIGNDAY = :vo.signday /* ,CNTRT_NO = ( SELECT CASE WHEN CNT1 = 0 THEN AUTO_CNTRD_NM + '0001' ELSE AUTO_CNTRD_NM + RIGHT(REPLICATE('0', 4) + CONVERT(VARCHAR,CONVERT(NUMERIC,SUBSTRING(MAX1,LEN(MAX1)-3,4))+1), 4) END AS AUTO_CNTRD_NM FROM ( SELECT (SELECT COUNT(CNTRT_ID) FROM TN_CLM_CONTRACT_MASTER A WHERE CHARINDEX( TA.AUTO_CNTRD_NM,CNTRT_NO) > 0) AS CNT1, (SELECT MAX(CNTRT_NO) FROM TN_CLM_CONTRACT_MASTER A WHERE CHARINDEX(TA.AUTO_CNTRD_NM,CNTRT_NO) > 0) AS MAX1, AUTO_CNTRD_NM FROM ( SELECT C.CNTRT_ID , A.USEMAN_MNG_ITM1 + RIGHT(ISNULL(:vo.cntrt_cnclsnday,'00000000'),6)+ '_' AS AUTO_CNTRD_NM FROM TB_COM_CD A , TN_CLM_CONTRACT_MASTER C WHERE C.CNTRT_ID = :vo.cntrt_id AND A.CD = C.COMP_CD AND A.SYS_CD = 'LAS' AND A.GRP_CD = 'COMP2' ) TA ) TB ) */ WHERE CNTRT_ID = :vo.cntrt_id
